page.title: 08LOCHALSH PRIMARY
page.content: There has been a school here for more than a hundred years.When my Grandfather came to school there were sixty to seventy pupils.I started school in 1978 and there were only six pupils_three boys and three girls.The next year Achmore School closed and the year following,Killilan School closed.The eight pupils involved came to this school.There are thirty-nine pupils now.Most of them come from Balmacara. There is a shelter and a climbing frame in the playground.In the canteen there is a cook,a server and a washer-up.We get nice dinners. We play lots of games.Today,the girls are skipping and the boys are building a hut up the hill. I come to school on a double-decker.
